title: Looking for a couple more Old Judges - great trade bait
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for a couple more Old Judges - great trade bait
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe_G.
It's been awhile since I last posted here and now have some new trade bait that might be of interest.

Looking For following Detroit N172 OJs:
Charlie Ganzel, any pose in nice condition (0492, 0493, 0494)
Ned Hanlon batting pose (0502)

The recently auctioned Ned Hanlon (Mastro, lot #1169 - one of eight ungraded OJ HOFers) is an example of what I'm looking for.  Anyone know who won that lot?  I have plenty of trade material in lower and higher grade including the following "arms folded" pose of Thompson (great card with a little back damage just like the cards in the Mastro lot).

<CENTER>[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1192066067.JPG[/IMG]</CENTER>

My wantlist wouldn't be complete without listing the following items as well.

N172 Lady Baldwin
N172 Pete Conway
N172 Pretzel Getzien
N172 Deacon White

Detroit cabinets (Tomlinson, N173, etc.)
Detroit Gypsy Queens, etc.

Best Regards,
Joe Gonsowski
